mapper.select: select * from sys_menu where parent_id IS null OR parent_id=''
select * from sys_menu where (parent_id !='' or parent_id is not null) and menu_type='menu'
select * from sys_menu where (parent_id !='' or parent_id is not null) and menu_type='button'

SELECT menu.id,menu.menu_id,menu.parent_id,menu.menu_name,menu.menu_url,menu.menu_type,menu.params,menu.icon from sys_menu menu,sys_role_menu rolemenu,sys_user_role userrole WHERE userrole.roleid=rolemenu.roleid AND rolemenu.menuid=menu.menu_id and userrole.userid=#{userid}
and parent_id =#{parentid} and menu_type !='button' GROUP BY menu.menu_id
